content.raw: This means publishers with throttled update rates will not publish at time=0, but will have to wait until the specified update period has passed. The alternative is to initialize prevPublishTime to (0,0) or the year 1970 or whatever, so it will publish as soon as it has a chance. It's not a huge deal, but I thought I'd mention it.

The alternative is to initialize prevPublishTime to (0,0) or the year 1970 or whatever, so it will publish as soon as it has a chance. It's not a huge deal, but I thought I'd mention it.
